title: Hand Tools
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419162309/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Tools](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419162309/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Tools) : Hand Tools**

Pen, ruling pen, Rapidograph, brush, paint, knife, straightedge, swivel knife, pencil, [Amberlith](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419162309/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Amberlith), visualizing paper, and a host of other devices preceeded today's digital tools in the design of type faces. Some are still used today for preliminary design work.
